entry.title: 【github】please tell me who you are
entry.content:
github 提示 please tell me who you are 可以参考以下资料：

*** Please tell me who you are.

Run

git config --global user.email "you@example.com"
git config --global user.name "Your Name"

to set your account's default identity.
Omit --global to set the identity only in this repository.

上面两行代码将你的 email 和 username 添加到全局配置中，这样对以后所有的 repository 都会使用这个配置。如果忽略 –global 则只对当前 repository 有效。

entry.title: Hexo Documents
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

Create a new post & page

$ hexo new "PostName"

$ hexo new page "pageName"

More info: Writing

Run server

$ hexo server

More info: Server

Generate static files

$ hexo generate

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites

$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment
